Container.Name: OpenRCT2
Container.Overview:
This Docker will download and install the preferred version of OpenRCT2.
ATTENTION: First Startup can take very long since it downloads the gameserver files!
Manual Installation: You can also drop a custom version (even a develop version) into the root of the server and restart the Docker, it will automaticaly install it (don' forget to set the variable 'Game Version' to that version that you are installing).
Update Notice: If you want to update or downgrade the game simply change the version number.
